note:
Amateur game developer. (I develop games under the SustAInable Games label but, considering I have no game dev revenue, I would say that qualifies me as an amateur!

I like making narrative games and tend to focus on sustainability.

Long time interactive fiction fan and retro gamer. (OK, I was playing those games before they were called retro games!) Also really love indie games, but I can get into AAA games if they have a strong narrative.
